Free and add-free,My Library allows you to store your personal library and to perform a quick search within it.

 My Library allows you to :

 - search books from out database
 - reserve books at your desired location
 - view your profile
 - rate books and authers
 - Sort your library by titles, names, categories, read / unread, ... 
 - send message to your librarian
 - look at your loan history
 - add comments to books
